# TagFormat enumeration

Tag formatting options.

```csharp
public enum TagFormat
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Capitalized | `0` | Tags start with an uppercase letter. |
| HashTag | `1` | Tags are lowercase, without spaces, and start with a '#' |
| AsEntered | `2` | Tags are as entered by the user |
